name: Five Nights at Monkey's
description:
Survive five nights in a crappy pizzeria... What could go wrong??

You pick up a newspaper one day and you see that there is a new pizzeria hiring right now. You are low on money, so why not?

After getting hired, you spend your first night shift there and realize something isn't right...

A mysterious phone person tells you how to get through the first few nights, but then he disappears... What will you do now??

Download the game to get the full experience. You can still play the browser version if you just want to have a quick session.
